title: 5 Zillion Man
description: 1500 lightyears ago, in a land far from sanity, but not far from madness, one mutant rock-and-roll wizard must guide the warring space clans towards peace and love.
altHero: 5 Zillion Man, with purple hair and mustache and three green eyes
alt3: 5 Zillion Man shooting a blue laser out of his guitar
alt4: alien being shot with the laser and you can see its skeleton
